title: Why hasnt riot changed the rp bundles yet?
body: Why are the rp amounts so awkward? I've seen a couple threads about this before, and the response from a lot of riot employees is usually "well actually, if you do the math you get more rp per aud than if we used exchange rates". This problem with this is that we have to pay more in total if we want to get a 1350rp or above skin. i dont want to pay extra  to get a 1350 rp skin and then have a useless amount left over. Please just change the bundles to be based on rp rather than a clean amount of $.

replies.body: I dunno about anyone else but I would rather spend a clean amount of money (easier to budget and manage) and get an awkward amount of RP (since the leftover doesn't go anywhere and you can use it later or on a key or something), than spend an awkward amount of money (more annoying to account for) and get a clean amount of RP.
